src/lib/components/SeqViz.react.js.description:
SeqViz is a Dash wrapper for the seqviz JavaScript library.
It provides DNA, RNA, and protein sequence visualization with
circular and linear viewers, annotations, primers, and more.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

seq.description: The sequence to render. Can be DNA, RNA, or amino acid sequence.

file.description: (Deprecated upstream) Sequence file or URL. Prefer parsing with seqparse.

accession.description: (Deprecated upstream) NCBI accession ID. Prefer parsing with seqparse.

name.description: The name of the sequence/plasmid. Shown at the center of the circular viewer.

viewer.description:
The type and orientation of the sequence viewers.
Options: "linear", "circular", "both", "both_flip"

annotations.description:
Array of annotation objects to render.
Each annotation: { start: number, end: number, name: string, direction?: number, color?: string }

primers.description:
Array of primer objects to render.
Each primer: { start: number, end: number, name: string, direction: number, color?: string }

highlights.description:
Array of highlight objects.
Each highlight: { start: number, end: number, color?: string }

translations.description:
Array of translation objects.
Each translation: { start: number, end: number, direction: number, name?: string, color?: string }

enzymes.description:
Array of restriction enzymes.
Can be enzyme names (strings) or custom enzyme objects.

search.description:
Search configuration object.
{ query: string, mismatch?: number }

selection.description:
Selection state object.
{ start: number, end: number, clockwise?: boolean }

colors.description: Array of colors for annotations, translations, and highlights.

bpColors.description: Object mapping base pairs or indexes to custom colors.

style.description: CSS styles for the outer container div.

zoom.description:
Zoom configuration object.
Currently supports: { linear: number } (0-100)

showComplement.description: Whether to show the complement sequence.

rotateOnScroll.description: Whether the circular viewer rotates on scroll.

disableExternalFonts.description: Whether to disable downloading external fonts.

enableCopyEvent.description: When false, disables the default copyEvent (ctrl/cmd + C).

enableSelectAllEvent.description: When false, disables the default selectAllEvent (ctrl/cmd + A).

searchResults.description: Search results emitted by seqviz (read-only for Dash usage).

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.
